name: Mouse-Human Alveolus Epithelium (from instructions.md)
notes: These entities refer to the same anatomical structure in different species

name: Cardiac Muscle vs Skeletal Muscle
description: Different types of muscle tissue - should be False
notes: Both are muscle tissues but fundamentally different types

name: Neuron vs Nerve Cell
description: Synonymous terms for the same cell type - should be True
notes: These are different names for the same cell type

name: Hepatocyte vs Liver Cell
description: Hepatocyte is the specific term for liver cell - should be True
notes: Hepatocyte is the scientific term for liver cell

name: Erythrocyte vs Leukocyte
description: Different types of blood cells - should be False
notes: Red blood cells and white blood cells are completely different

name: Pulmonary Artery vs Lung Artery
description: Same anatomical structure with different naming - should be True
notes: These refer to the same blood vessel

name: Kidney vs Renal Organ
description: Same organ with Latin and common names - should be True
notes: Kidney and renal organ are the same

name: Pancreas vs Spleen
description: Different abdominal organs - should be False
notes: Completely different organs with different functions

name: Myocardium vs Heart Muscle
description: Scientific and common term for heart muscle - should be True
notes: Myocardium is the medical term for heart muscle

name: Dendrite vs Axon
description: Different parts of a neuron - should be False
notes: Dendrites and axons are distinct neuronal structures
